item.title: Iris
item.description: Iris is a Java library that allows your Java applications to communicate with Metriclyâ€™s REST API. You can use Iris to send metrics from your applications to Metricly, create dashboards, tags, elements, and much more. Configuration Include the proper dependency from Maven for the appropriate build manager. Invoke the REST API client interface in a central location that your various Java classes can access while ensuring you replace username and password with the appropriate values.
